refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: const gchar* gnome_keyring_result_to_message (GnomeKeyringResult res); enum GnomeKeyringResult;

para.para: Result codes used through out GNOME Keyring. Additional result codes may be added from time to time and these should be handled gracefully.

refsect2.title: gnome_keyring_result_to_message ()
refsect2.para: The GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_OK and GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_CANCELLED codes will return an empty string.
Note that there are some results for which the application will need to take appropriate action rather than just display an error message to the user.

listitem.simpara: a string suitable for display to the user for a given GnomeKeyringResult, or an empty string if the message wouldn't make sense to a user.

refsect2.title: enum GnomeKeyringResult
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_OK, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_DENIED, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_NO_KEYRING_DAEMON, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_ALREADY_UNLOCKED, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_NO_SUCH_KEYRING, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_BAD_ARGUMENTS, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_IO_ERROR, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_CANCELLED, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_KEYRING_ALREADY_EXISTS, GNOME_KEYRING_RESULT_NO_MATCH } GnomeKeyringResult;
